1192960.name: RPG Driver
1192960.description:
You are the driver! You are given a choice of more than 5 different cars, each with its own history and purpose. You can save people by ambulance, put out fires, stop bandits or jump in the mountains in a big jeep.
Get experience and money, improve your skill tree and car, compete with other drivers and explore a unique set of levels consisting of 20 unique tracks that can be walked in different directions and with different tasks.

You will also find a sea of ​​sparkling humor and satire on role-playing games, you will meet aliens, UFOs, tripods, evil military men, bandits, as well as a large number of puzzles and hidden locations.

Key Features:


  • 1. A procedurally generated world, consisting of various levels, united by a common network of roads. Each race takes place in a random place in the world, making every attempt to play unique. Artificial intelligence competes with you both locally in the current task and globally in the economic aspect of the generated world.

  • 2. Destroyed world: I see the goal, I see no obstacles! Break trees, buildings, enemies and everything around, but do not forget about fixing your car.

  • 3. An RPG system of characteristics that affect both driving a specific car and global dominance in the game, get experience, levels, money and use them to level your character and car to outperform competitors in a big race!

  • 4. A lot of references to the origins of the genre, classic films and a lot of humor.
1192960.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 阿拉伯语, 保加利亚语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 匈牙利语, 越南语, 希腊语, 丹麦语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 繁体中文, 简体中文, 韩语, 荷兰语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 罗马尼亚语, 俄语, 泰语, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语, 芬兰语, 捷克语, 瑞典语, 日语
